name: LD31 - Worm Wars
description:
LD31 - Worm Wars

Worm Wars is a game made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 31. The theme was "Entire Game on One Screen."

In this game, you control a worm, and your objective is to grow as long as possible without crashing into yourself, the walls, or other worms.

  • Supports up to 4 players locally. (4 gamepads required!)
  • Compete with or without AI.
